assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Eicher Motors Limited manufactures and sells motorcycles and commercial vehicles in India and internationally. The company owns the Royal Enfield motorcycle brand that offers Classic, Bullet, Himalayan, Interceptor INT 650, Continental GT 650, and Thunderbird models. It designs, develops, manufactures, assembles, and sells two-wheelers, as well as sells related parts and accessories. The company, through its joint venture, Volvo Eicher Commercial Vehicles Limited, manufactures and sells light and medium duty trucks, heavy duty trucks, and buses under the Eicher brand; Volvo trucks; and engineering components and aggregates. Eicher Motors Limited was founded in 1948 and is based in Gurugram, India.
